text: @ehananoki 1/ Wouldn’t it be grand if just 1 @FoxNews Pundit praised Americans for the courage & shared sacrifice to flatten the #COVID19 curve for the greater good of society? We are all in this together.  @JudgeJeanine @IngrahamAngle @WalshFreedom @seanhannity
